GALLERY - COMING SOON

Angelina Puffelis

LMFT


        I am a licensed marriage and family therapist who provides therapy to a diverse population in either Engish, or Spanish for individual, family, couples, single parents, blended families, divorced parents, and children 0-5 years-old.

        My therapy style is relaxed and nurturing. My main objective is to provide an environment of safety and security in which you can experience and feel comfortable sharing your story. I have a sense of humor and a lighthearted nature and I am not afraid to nudge you to achieve your desired goals.

        I work from an attachment perspective, which means I am intrigued in the underlying emotions and unmet attachment needs that drive the way you think, act, and feel. Throughout this process, you will obtain the skills to manage your emotions and regain balance in your relationships.

S T A T E M E N T

HRT’s mission is to compassionately help, support, and guide each client in their journey in finding new healthy ways to meet their goals. While establishing the foundations of a safe and trusting relationship, clients will discover their untapped potential, by developing new strengths and abilities, while inquiring resourceful insight . There is no greater delight to see a client reach these accomplishments.
